pages.title: Magnetite Vein
pages.text: Magnetite Vein has a medium reserve of iron and gold

Main Ore:Iron$(br)Associated Ores:Gold$(br2)Heights:32-48$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Medium$(br)Vein Density:Relatively High$(br2)Indicator:Sunstone Glow Rose$(br)Vein Rarity:Relatively Rare$(br2)Dimension:Overworld
